title: Lets talk about Udyr
body:
Udyr needs a rework badly. He is the most antifun champion in game. All he has to do is run around and split push and no one can stop him since he is retardly fast. I am starting to think there needs to be a movement speed cap. Hecrium gets retarded damage from his E also because of movement speed.

Udyr is just toxic play and either give every other champion a speed boost or something. I'm sure everyone else in this game would be happier if udyr would just slow down to make his "split pushing" more of a riskier play.

First of all, you're in Silver IV, that doesn't give you all that much leeway with calling someone else a Bronze.

Secondly, Udyr is fine, coming from another Jungler. He's only difficult to deal with if he gets fed early on, but the same can be said for almost any other jungle champion.

Powerful ganks? His gank is literally running headfirst into the lane with a small MS boost. Assuming you're playing smart and not constantly shoving, and if you have wards up, you literally should never get ganked by an Udyr, if you are getting ganked constantly by an Udyr, you're doing something wrong. Very. Very. Wrong.

First of all I'm a diamond player so I believe I know what I'm talking about. This is called a suggestion but as I can tell you are of lower intelligence; I'm talking more of a late game nerf instead of an early game nerf.

man i can tell everyone commenting on this is obviously at bronze level lol. Udyr doesn't get played competatively but that doesn't mean he doesn't need fixed. Udyr has overly stupid powerful ganks. Udyr's later game has been a problem for a long time. He is just too fast compared to anyone else. There needs to be risk involved when split pushing.
Udyr see virtually no competitive play, has really weak ganks, and is pretty damn easy to counter.  Without being a strong split-pusher he would offer virtually nothing to a team.

Obviously you have never went against an Udyr lol. Coming from a jungle main I know for a fact how stupid udyr is and I'm praying for that nerf soon. I just wished Riot would nerf him now instead of waiting so long.

As a jungle main, I disagree
nothing wrong with udyr in particular, split pushing in general is typically not very risky
All you need is map awareness

Its risky as hell if you were to split push with champions not known for split pushing, of course... thats why no one ever does and we dont factor that
